00003 #include "ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"

00006 using namespace std;

00008 ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter::ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00009 ORVTreeWriter(new ORGretaDecoder, treeName)
00010 {
00011   fEventDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORGretaDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00012   fLEDEventTime = 0.;
00013   fCFDEventTime = 0.;
00014   fCrate = 0;
00015   fCard = 0;
00016   fChannel = 0;
00017   fBoard = 0;
00018   fEnergy = 0;
00019   fWaveformLength = 0;
00020   fWaveform[0] = 0;  // this is on the stack, not the heap.
00021   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00022 }
00023 
00024 ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter::~ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter()
00025 {
00026   delete fEventDecoder;
00027 }
00028 
00029 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00030 {
00031   fTree->Branch("wfLength", &fWaveformLength, "wfLength/i");
00032   fTree->Branch("LEDEventTime", &fLEDEventTime, "LEDEventTime/D");
00033   fTree->Branch("CFDEventTime", &fCFDEventTime, "CFDEventTime/D");
00034   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00035   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00036   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00037   fTree->Branch("board", &fBoard, "board/s");
00038   fTree->Branch("energy", &fEnergy, "energy/i");
00039   fTree->Branch("waveform", fWaveform, "waveform[wfLength]/s");
00040   return kSuccess;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORGretaWaveformTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00044 {
00045   // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00046   // ruin the rest of the run.
00047   if(!fEventDecoder->SetDataRecord(record)) return kFailure;
00048   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) 
00049   { 
00050     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00051       << "LEDtime-crate-card-channel-energy = "
00052       << fEventDecoder->GetLEDExtTimeStamp() << "-"
00053       << fEventDecoder->CrateOf() << "-"
00054       << fEventDecoder->CardOf() << "-" 
00055       << fEventDecoder->GetChannelNum() << "-"
00056       << fEventDecoder->GetEnergy() << endl;
00057   }
00058   fLEDEventTime = fEventDecoder->GetLEDExtTimeStamp();
00059   fCFDEventTime = fEventDecoder->GetCFDTimeStamp();
00060   fCrate = fEventDecoder->CrateOf();
00061   fCard = fEventDecoder->CardOf();
00062   fBoard = fEventDecoder->GetBoardId();
00063   fChannel = fEventDecoder->GetChannelNum();
00064   fEnergy = fEventDecoder->GetEnergy();
00065   fWaveformLength = fEventDecoder->CopyWaveformData(fWaveform, kMaxWFLength);
00066   fTree->Fill();
00067   return kSuccess;
00068 }
